程序包 sokobanfx.state

接口 GameState

所有已知实现类:
StartState, StopState
public interface GameState
GameState class is used for choosing the game state.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void setState​(Context context)
    Sets the game state.
    void showHighScore()
    Shows the high score list

  • 方法详细资料

    • setState

      void setState​(Context context) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets the game state.
      参数:
      context - the game context
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the score list is found or not
